definition: to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign

sentences.english: Article 212 The pledge right shall be established after the pledgee has delivered the pledged properties.
sentences.chinese: 第二百一十二条质权自出质人交付质押财产时设立。

sentences.english: The hypothecation contract goes into effect as of the date the hypothecated shares are recorded in the stock ledger.
sentences.chinese: 质押合同自股份出质记载于股东名册之日起生效。

sentences.english: The droit of patent application as an inpawningobject is legal and doable.
sentences.chinese: 专利申请权作为质押标的是合乎法理并且是可行的。

sentences.english: There is no clear stipulation in Chinas Mortgage Law whether an insurance policy can be mortgaged.
sentences.chinese: 我国《担保法》没有明确规定保险单是否可用于质押。

sentences.english: Failure to register the pledge shall not affect the validity of the contract.
sentences.chinese: 未办理质权登记的，不影响股权质押合同的效力。

sentences.english: If a pledge contract has the contents incompletely prescribed in the proceeding paragraph, it may be supplemented.
sentences.chinese: 质押合同不完全具备前款规定内容的，可以补正。

sentences.english: Application for reporting the loss of the hypothecated deposit certificate shall be made in written form.
sentences.chinese: 质押存单的挂失申请应采用书面形式。

sentences.english: And once again, the economy will be held captive unless they get their way.
sentences.chinese: 美国经济将再一次被用作质押，除非他们如愿以偿。

sentences.english: Other rights that can be hypothecated according to law.
sentences.chinese: 依法可以质押的其他权利。

sentences.english: This allows a Pledgee under a Pledge agreement to reuse Collateral received.
sentences.chinese: 允许质押协议项下的质权人再次使用收到的担保品。

sentences.english: The pledge contract shall be effective as of the date of registration.
sentences.chinese: 质押合同自登记之日起生效。

sentences.english: Article 2 The State Intellectual Property Office is responsible for the registration of the pledge of patent rights.
sentences.chinese: 第二条国家知识产权局负责专利权质押登记工作。

sentences.english: A failure to carry out pledge registration procedures shall not affect the validity of the equity pledge contract.
sentences.chinese: 未办理质权登记的，不影响股权质押合同的效力。

sentences.english: The first chapter throws light on fundamental theory of pledge of atypical rights.
sentences.chinese: 第一章阐明了非典型权利质押的基础理论。

sentences.english: The time deposit certificates of entities can only be opened and used for loans against a pledge.
sentences.chinese: 单位定期存单只能以质押贷款为目的开立和使用。

sentences.english: The 3rd kind assures means calls the right impawn.
sentences.chinese: 第三种担保方式叫权利质押。
